meanings.definition: Emitting a strong and unpleasant odor.
meanings.sent1: The garbage was stinking up the whole room.
meanings.sent2: The stinking socks needed to be washed immediately.
meanings.sent3: I couldn't stand the stinking smell coming from the fridge!
meanings.sent4: The stinking alley behind the restaurant was a breeding ground for rats.
meanings.sent5: The stinking odor of rotten eggs filled the kitchen.

meanings.sent1: The movie was so stinking boring that I fell asleep.
meanings.sent2: The stinking weather ruined our picnic plans.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat found the stinking medicine unappetizing.
meanings.sent4: The stinking behavior of the bullies was unacceptable.
meanings.sent5: The stinking taste of the medicine made me gag.

meanings.sent1: The criminal's stinking actions landed him in jail.
meanings.sent2: The stinking lies he told were finally exposed.
meanings.sent3: His stinking excuse for being late was laughable.
meanings.sent4: The stinking betrayal by his friend hurt deeply.
meanings.sent5: The stinking behavior of the politician angered the public.
